Description
org.springframework.boot.jdbc.metadata
Support for accessing JDBC DataSource metadata.

    Methods in org.springframework.boot.jdbc.metadata that return DataSourcePoolMetadata
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @Nullable DataSourcePoolMetadata
    CompositeDataSourcePoolMetadataProvider.getDataSourcePoolMetadata(DataSource dataSource)
     
    @Nullable DataSourcePoolMetadata
    DataSourcePoolMetadataProvider.getDataSourcePoolMetadata(DataSource dataSource)
    Return the DataSourcePoolMetadata instance able to manage the specified DataSource or null if the given data source could not be handled.
